body:
For the past few days I have been getting extremely fustrated with life, because people think I do everything wrong. Some people might Hate on this post, but what the heck life has ups and downs! I just want to explain if I have Done anything which has made me or you hate me... I want to start over, Start fresh, and instead of making enemies, make friends.

These are the people I want to say Extremely Sorry to:

jozzmcozz
bmbrocks321 
RemyleOuisititi
BiomePython
Dynam0FTW
Plaza_17
 
I hope you guys forgive me and give me another chance, Thanks Guys!

title: Sorry Guys!

replies.body: Dude don't worry about it. :) Everyone has hard days, no one is perfect! Apology accepted.
replies.body_tagged: Dude don't worry about it. :) Everyone has hard days, no one is perfect! Apology accepted.

replies.body: You didn't do anything to me but I am happy you are apologizing to those people. :-).
replies.body_tagged: You didn't do anything to me but I am happy you are apologizing to those people. :-).
